title: LSU QB Nussmeier dealing with patellar tendinitis
content: LSU quarterback Garrett Nussmeier is dealing with patellar tendinitis in his knee after aggravating the issue in practice this week, according to coach Brian Kelly.

title: 'Vibrant' Sanders says Buffs will 'win differently'
content: After a recent cancer scare, Colorado coach Deion Sanders says he's feeling "healthy and vibrant" ahead of his team's season opener against Georgia Tech on Aug. 29 in Boulder.

title: Dolphins' McDaniel breaks up skirmish vs. Bears
content: Several skirmishes broke out between the Dolphins and Bears during their joint practice on Friday, at least one of which Miami coach Mike McDaniel jumped in the middle of in an effort to break up the fracas.

title: Celtics sign coach Mazzulla to multiyear extension
content: The Celtics have signed coach Joe Mazzulla to a multiyear contract extension. Mazzulla has won at least 57 games in each of his three seasons in Boston as well as the 2023-24 NBA title.

title: Free agent Beasley, in gambling inquiry, evicted
content: NBA free agent Malik Beasley, who is under investigation in a federal gambling probe, was evicted from his high-rise apartment in Detroit on Wednesday, according to court records.

title: Tkachuk: Could miss 2 or 3 months with surgery
content: Panthers star Matthew Tkachuk said he remains undecided about getting surgery before the season but acknowledged he could miss significant time should he require it.

title: 1st-pitch bets face possible Ohio ban amid probe
content: Ohio regulators are mulling a ban on offering so-called microbets, including betting markets on first pitches in MLB, amid a gambling investigation into two Cleveland Guardians pitchers.

title: Brewers to sell Murphy's viral 'pocket pancakes'
content: The Brewers announced Friday that "Murph's Pocket Pancakes" will be sold at American Family Field during Sunday games for the rest of the season.

title: Do Draft list: Henry, Purdy, Kelce among players being undervalued
content: In the perennial counterpart to the Do Not Draft list, Eric Karabell discusses players who are being underappreciated in fantasy football drafts.

title: Does NFL success and fame translate to college football success? These schools are betting it does
content: With high expectations for this new wave of celebrity coaches that includes Eddie George, reputation can take these leaders only so far.

title: Do the Cubs have a championship-level roster? Here's what MLB insiders think
content: After a trade deadline that was more mild than wild, we asked around the sport to see if the Cubs have enough to win big.

title: Caitlin Clark and 13 more impact WNBA players for playoff (or future) success
content: The margin for error is shrinking as the playoffs approach. Who will be the difference-makers for their teams?

title: 12 colleges stacked with NFL draft talent: Why scouts are watching Penn State, Clemson this season
content: Which schools have the best talent for next year's draft? We picked 12 must-watch rosters loaded with potential future first-rounders.

title: 'I'm made for it': Austin Simmons gets his shot at Ole Miss
content: At 19, the two-sport star has already graduated from Ole Miss, but he's getting his first chance to start at QB.

title: Can Wrexham's Hollywood fairy tale continue in Championship, or is rude awakening ahead?
content: Celebrity owners Ryan Reynolds and Rob Mac said Wrexham will reach the Premier League -- but the closer they get, the more unrealistic it is.

title: When will Cooper Flagg be an All-Star? Projecting the No. 1 pick's NBA future
content: How many MVPs and titles for Cooper Flagg? When can Dallas expect success with him? ESPN experts predict his NBA future.

title: UFC Fight Night: Expert picks, best bets for Dolidze vs. Hernandez
content: MMA expert Din Thomas picks Dolidze vs. Hernandez and a betting insider finds value bets on this weekend's MMA cards.

title: After four tumultuous years away from MMA, is McGregor staging a comeback?
content: Conor McGregor wants to fight at the White House in 2026 and has begun drug testing. Can a comeback really happen?

title: Week 11 preview: What's at stake in the final regular-season weekend?
content: The PLL heads to Boston, with three playoff spots open. Here's the game schedule, clinching scenarios, more.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Arsenal eye move for Lookman
content: Arsenal are looking to make a move for Atalanta winger Ademola Lookman. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: USMNT 2026 World Cup Big Board 1.0: Early picks for Pochettino's team
content: With players focusing on the looming European club season, nine months remain before World Cup squads are announced. Who will be on the U.S.'s?

title: Texas to Pennsylvania: Can you ace the last 'SportsCenter' 50-in-50 quiz?
content: Close out the "SportsCenter" 50-state road trip with nine questions from the Lone Star State to the Keystone State and several in between.

title: Waiver wire: Look to Shepard, Carleton while Collier is out
content: Minnesota's Jessica Shepard and Bridget Carleton are worth adding from the waiver wire following the injury to Lynx star Napheesa Collier.

title: Will Rahul's 'vote theft' attack on EC undercut INDIA bloc's SIR stance in Bihar?
content: Rahul Gandhi has accused the Election Commission of India (ECI) of electoral roll lapses in Karnataka, presenting documents as evidence of "vote chori." The ECI has requested Gandhi to submit an oath-bound declaration along with his evidence to initiate a probe. The BJP has criticised Gandhi, accusing him of undermining the ECI and inadvertently supporting electoral roll revisions.

title: 'Great Depression': Trump's '1929' warning to US court - is his tariff war about to hit legal wall?
content: Donald Trump cautioned American courts against weakening the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA), a law he used to impose tariffs, including a 50% tariff on India. Trump warned on Truth Social that invalidating the IEEPA could trigger a severe economic downturn, likening it to the Great Depression of 1929.

title: 'Why not all airlines?' SC junks plea for AI safety audit
content: The Supreme Court has questioned a petition seeking a safety audit of Air India's fleet following a recent incident. Justices rebuked the petitioner, suggesting it was unfair to single out one airline after the Ahmedabad crash.

title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman at GPT-5 launch: India is our second-largest market
content: OpenAI has launched GPT-5, its most advanced AI model, boasting significant improvements in accuracy, speed, and reasoning. CEO Sam Altman highlighted India as a rapidly growing market, potentially surpassing the US. GPT-5 is available in various sizes and tiers, including a free version, with enhanced versions for Team, Enterprise, Edu, and Pro users, marking a step towards Artificial General Intelligence.

title: Congress functionaries back Rahul Gandhi's 'vote chori' accusation, opposition allies join in
content: Following Rahul Gandhi's "vote chori" expose, the Congress party is launching a nationwide campaign to highlight alleged irregularities in the electoral process. State units will screen Rahul's press conference, and Mallikarjun Kharge will discuss a national offensive on "election fraud" with party leaders.

title: Rahul Gandhi's 'false narrative' rejected thrice, will be ignored again: BJP
content: BJP refuted Rahul Gandhi's rigging allegations in Maharashtra polls, stating Congress won seats with increased voter turnout. Union Minister Bhupender Yadav cited Election Commission data, clarifying a 40 lakh voter increase, not one crore as claimed.

title: An entire country is shifting to Australia, as first planned migration is underway
content: Tuvalu, a Pacific island nation, faces imminent submersion due to rising sea levels, prompting a groundbreaking planned migration. A treaty with Australia allows 280 Tuvaluans annually to gain permanent residency, accessing essential services.

title: Monsoon session: Parliament proceedings washed out again amid opposition stir
content: Both Rajya Sabha and Lok Sabha faced disruptions due to opposition protests demanding a discussion on Bihar's special intensive revision of electoral rolls. The deputy chairman of Rajya Sabha rejected notices for suspending business, leading to uproar and adjournment. Despite the chaos in Lok Sabha, some questions were addressed, and the Income Tax Bill, 2025 was withdrawn for revision.

title: NOTA can't be treated as candidate, Centre tells SC
content: The Centre has strongly opposed the Supreme Court's examination of whether 'NOTA' can be a rival candidate when only one candidate is contesting. The government argues that 'NOTA' is merely an option, not a candidate under the Representation of the People Act, 1951. They also clarified that the right to vote arises only when a poll involves multiple candidates.

title: Careers in tech: Google CEO Sundar Pichai to youngsters; I believe that best employees are...
content: Google CEO Sundar Pichai, now a billionaire, emphasizes the importance of self-criticism and embracing discomfort for professional growth. He encourages Gen Z to pursue their passions and work with individuals who challenge their abilities. Pichai's management philosophy centers on building mission-oriented teams driven by a shared pursuit of excellence, fostering an environment of trust and commitment.

title: EC increases remuneration, honorarium for poll duty staffers
content: The Election Commission has increased the remuneration for officials and staff involved in conducting elections. Presiding officers will now receive Rs 500 daily, while polling officers will get Rs 400 per day or a lump sum of Rs 1,600.

title: 'I’d have to get the police involved': Dwyane Wade revealed why his first marriage fell apart
content: Dwyane Wade's personal life faced turmoil before his marriage to Gabrielle Union. His previous marriage to Siohvaughn Funches ended in 2008 amidst accusations of domestic violence and a difficult co-parenting relationship. Wade and Union briefly separated in 2013, during which he fathered a child with another woman, but they reconciled and married in 2014.

title: NFL star Tyreek Hill and ex-wife Keeta's baby Capri rushed to ER; now on the mend
content: Tyreek Hill's eight-month-old daughter, Capri, was rushed to the emergency room after developing alarming symptoms, causing significant concern for her mother, Keeta Vaccaro. Doctors swiftly stabilized Capri, and her condition improved by sunrise. Despite ongoing family turmoil, the outpouring of support from fans highlights the shared relief and gratitude for Capri's recovery.

title: Selena Gomez opens up about Taylor Swift reportedly ending all ties with Blake Lively
content: Amidst personal changes, Taylor Swift's friendship with Blake Lively reportedly ended due to legal issues involving Justin Baldoni. Selena Gomez discussed her long-standing bond with Swift, revealing their shared history of dating Jonas Brothers. Swift and Kelce are expected at Gomez's wedding. Swift has been seen reconnecting with Gomez, while distancing herself from Lively and Ryan Reynolds.

title: Jaz Agassi’s sweet support for dad Andre Agassi — Steffi Graf moment resurfaces
content: Andre Agassi addressed Shore Capital Partner’s Leadership Academy in New York City on July 14, 2025, emphasizing leadership, mindset, and purpose. Following the fireside chat with Jish Bia, Agassi's daughter, Jaz, expressed her admiration on Instagram. Agassi has previously discussed parenting and his efforts to break negative cycles, highlighting his and Steffi Graf's influence on their children.

title: Only 996 of 13.9L allopathic doctors in NMR
content: The National Medical Register, a database for allopathic doctors, faces challenges. Launched in August 2024, it has seen low registration numbers. Out of 13.9 lakh doctors, only 996 have registered. Many applications are pending approval. The initiative aimed to strengthen digital healthcare. Registers for nurses and paramedics are also planned. However, progress is slow.

title: SC to examine validity of BNS 'sedition' provision
content: The Supreme Court is set to review the constitutional validity of Section 152 of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS), which deals with sedition. A petition challenging the provision, filed by retired Maj Gen S G Vombatkere, argues it mirrors the contentious Section 124A of the IPC.

title: 'India in talks with several countries': Goyal dismisses Trump's 'dead economy' jab
content: India is actively pursuing trade agreements with various nations, including Oman, the European Union, and the United States. These discussions occur as the US imposes tariffs on Indian goods. Piyush Goyal dismisses concerns about de-globalization and expresses confidence in India's economic strength. He anticipates that India's exports will exceed $825 billion by 2025-26.

title: 'Tired script': EC slams Rahul's 'vote theft' claim; cites 2018 SC decision
content: The Election Commission (EC) has strongly refuted Rahul Gandhi's allegations of voter fraud, labeling them a repetition of old, baseless claims. The EC challenged Gandhi to either substantiate his accusations with formal verification or apologize to the nation.

title: ‘Rudrastra’: India’s longest freight train with 354 wagons hits tracks; Watch video
content: Indian Railways has launched 'Rudrastra,' its longest freight train ever, stretching 4.5 kilometers. Composed of 354 wagons and powered by seven locomotives, the train was formed by linking six standard rakes. It journeyed from Ganjkhwaja to Garhwa Road, covering 200 km at an average speed of 40 km/h.

title: Shubman Gill's mic-drop moment: 'I want to be the best'
content: Shubman Gill's stellar performance in England, amassing 754 runs and leading as the top scorer, has garnered praise, with Dinesh Karthik highlighting his technical improvements and composed media handling. Gill addressed doubts about his overseas form with conviction, notably shining in the second Test at Edgbaston with a double century and a hundred.

title: Billy Howton former Green Bay Packers star and NFLPA founder passes away at 95
content: Billy Howton, the Green Bay Packers' legendary wide receiver and NFL Players Association founder, passed away at 95. He revolutionized the game, becoming the first rookie to achieve over 1,000 receiving yards. Howton's efforts to establish the NFL Players Association secured better rights and pensions for players, leaving a lasting legacy.

title: Education Bill passed in Delhi Assembly; fee hikes in private schools to be regulated
content: The Delhi Assembly has passed 'The Delhi School Education (Transparency in Fixation and Regulation of Fees) Bill, 2025', granting the government more control over private school fees due to significant fee hikes in the 2025-26 academic year. Schools must now get approval for fee increases and disclose all charges, with penalties for non-compliance.

title: 'I will surrender': BJP MP Dubey after FIR filed over 'forcible' temple entry
content: BJP MP Nishikant Dubey and others, including Manoj Tiwari, face charges for allegedly forcing their way into the Baba Baidyanath temple's sanctum sanctorum in Deoghar. A priest's complaint alleges the group's actions, violating restrictions during 'Shravan,' hurt religious sentiments and caused a disturbance. Dubey claims he's being targeted for performing 'puja' and intends to surrender.

title: 'Seems fake': EC asks Tejashwi to surrender 'false EPIC'; says 'it is a legal offence'
content: The Election Commission has declared the EPIC card presented by RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav as "fake" and demanded its submission by August 16. This action follows Yadav's demand for accountability from the EC regarding the issuance of two EPIC numbers to him.

title: Boost to defence: India to replace aging Chetak, Cheetah choppers; 200 light helicopters planned
content: The Indian Army is gearing up to replace its aging Chetak and Cheetah helicopters with 200 modern light helicopters, as indicated by the defence ministry's recent request for information. This initiative aligns with India's Aatmnirbhar Bharat campaign, emphasising indigenous defence manufacturing through partnerships between Indian companies and original equipment manufacturers.

title: Travis Kelce & Taylor Swift absent at funeral; his father Jason Kelce attends alone
content: Ed Kelce held a memorial for his partner, Maureen Maguire, who passed away at 74, in Gladwyne, Pennsylvania. Jason Kelce and his wife Kylie attended, but Travis Kelce was absent due to Kansas City Chiefs training camp. Taylor Swift, currently on her "Eras Tour" in the UK and Europe, was also not present.

title: Amid standoff with US, Modi speaks to Putin, says he’ll host him this year
content: Following NSA Ajit Doval's meeting, PM Modi spoke with President Putin, inviting him to the annual India-Russia summit and reiterating India's call for a peaceful resolution to the Russia-Ukraine conflict. Putin briefed Modi on the war's developments. Both leaders reviewed bilateral progress and reaffirmed their commitment to strengthening the India-Russia partnership.

title: How to deal with Trump? Netanyahu says he has advise for PM Modi - will share on one condition
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has offered India assistance in navigating US tariffs, suggesting he'd privately advise PM Modi on dealing with President Trump. He highlighted the effectiveness of Israeli weapons used in Operation Sindoor and expressed willingness to enhance India's surveillance capabilities to combat cross-border terrorism.

title: 75+ heartfelt Raksha bandhan wishes, messages, and quotes for 2025
content: Raksha Bandhan celebrates the cherished bond between siblings with love, memories, and protection. This collection offers over 75 wishes and quotes to express heartfelt emotions, from playful greetings to emotional reflections. It includes blessings, funny messages, and thoughtful lines for sisters and brothers, perfect for long-distance celebrations and sentimental moments.

title: Elon Musk updates Mars mission timeline: Starship crewed by Optimus possible in 2026; real target now 2028–2030
content: Elon Musk has adjusted SpaceX's Mars mission timeline, pushing back the potential Starship launch to 2028 for an uncrewed flight and 2030 for a crewed mission. Technical challenges, including Starship failures and delays in mastering in-space propellant refuelling, have contributed to this shift.

title: 'No pause in talks for buying US arms': Centre pans 'false & fabricated' report
content: The defence ministry has refuted reports suggesting India halted defense purchase talks with the US, labeling them as false. This response follows a Reuters report indicating a pause in weapon and aircraft acquisitions due to US tariffs on Indian exports. Despite this, the ministry clarified that procurement cases are progressing as per established procedures.

title: OnlyFans bombshell: Astronomer ex-CEO spent Rs 2.2cr on site; secret chats leaked by wife
content: Following his resignation over a Coldplay concert controversy, former Astronomer CEO Andy Byron faces new allegations of spending over $250,000 on OnlyFans. Influencer Camilla Araujo claims Byron engaged with multiple creators, including Sophie Rain, through subscriptions, custom content, and video calls. Leaked messages allegedly show Byron using a secret Instagram account to arrange explicit video calls, further fueling the scandal.

title: How to make edible rakhis (Yes, you can eat them!)
content: Raksha Bandhan 2025 brings a delicious twist. Edible rakhis are the new trend. These rakhis feature treats like candies and chocolates. Five recipes are available. Marzipan and Khoya rakhis offer traditional sweetness. Dried fruit rakhis provide a healthy option. Halwa in a chocolate cup combines tradition with indulgence. Energy bar rakhis offer a nutritious and tasty choice. Read more below!

title: James Webb telescope detects possible new exoplanet just 4 light-years away from Earth
content: Astronomers found a possible planet around Alpha Centauri A. The James Webb Space Telescope spotted the gas giant. It is within the star's habitable zone. The exoplanet is closest to our solar system. Scientists are excited about future studies. This discovery opens doors for interstellar exploration. It also fuels science fiction fans' imagination.

title: 'Enough is enough': Rahul launches fresh attack on EC; poses 5 questions
content: Rahul Gandhi escalated his accusations against the Election Commission of India (ECI), alleging collusion with the BJP to manipulate voter rolls and ensure Narendra Modi's victory. He presented purported evidence of "fake votes" in Karnataka and questioned the ECI's impartiality, demanding answers regarding missing voter lists, erased CCTV footage, and intimidation of opposition leaders.

title: Virat Kohli's surprise coach revealed ahead of international comeback
content: Virat Kohli has commenced his training regimen in London, gearing up for his anticipated return to one-day international cricket. He was seen practicing his batting skills in an indoor session with Naeem Amin, the assistant coach for Gujarat Titans.

title: Is Virat Kohli retiring from ODIs? Viral pic raises eyebrows
content: Virat Kohli's grey beard sparked retirement rumors after a photo with Shash Kiran went viral. However, Kohli is preparing for his ODI return, training in London with Naeem Amin. He last played in the IPL 2025 final, leading Royal Challengers Bengaluru to victory.

title: ‘India not so unfortunate...’: Owaisi on Netanyahu’s offer to ‘advise’ PM Modi
content: Asaduddin Owaisi, Hyderabad MP and AIMIM chief, strongly criticized Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's offer to advise PM Modi on dealing with potential US tariffs. Owaisi labeled Netanyahu a "war criminal" and accused him of genocide against Palestinians in Gaza, citing significant casualties and displacement.

title: Man Gets Life Imprisonment For Raping 2-Year-Old Cousin In 2022
content: A local court here sentenced a man to life imprisonment for raping a two-year-old girl in 2022, an official said on Friday.

title: Iran Says Israel Seeking To "Ethnically Cleanse" Gaza In New Plan
content: Iran's foreign ministry on Friday condemned Israel's updated war plan that includes taking control of Gaza City, accusing Israel of seeking to "ethnically cleanse" the Palestinian territory.

title: Case Against BJP MPs Nishikant Dubey, Manoj Tiwari For "Forcibly Entering" Temple
content: The Jharkhand Police on Friday said it has registered an FIR against BJP MPs Nishikant Dubey, Manoj Tiwari and others for "forcibly" entering the sanctum sanctorum of the Baba Baidyanath Temple in Deoghar on August 2 and hurting religious sentiments.

title: Trump Orders Federal Law Enforcers Onto Streets Of Washington DC
content: With President Donald Trump calling for a federal takeover of the nation's capital city, the White House says there will be an increased presence of federal law enforcement on the streets of Washington, DC, for at least the next week.

title: Syria's Minorities Demand For Constitution That Guarantees Pluralism
content: Hundreds of representatives of Syria's various ethnic and religious groups called Friday for the formation of a decentralised state and the drafting of a new constitution that guarantees religious, cultural and ethnic pluralism.

title: Hizbul-Mujahideen Chief's Son Granted Bail, Another Denied
content: The Delhi High Court on Friday granted bail to one of the sons of Hizb-ul-Mujahideen chief Syed Salahuddin while denying the relief to another in a terror funding case.

title: Delhi Assembly Renames 'Phansi Ghar' As 'Tiffin Room'
content: The Delhi Assembly on Friday renamed the so-called 'Phansi Ghar' as 'Tiffin Room', a day after Speaker Vijender Gupta asserted that there was no such thing as claimed by the previous AAP government, officials said.

title: US Has No Plans To Recognise Palestinian State: JD Vance
content: US Vice President JD Vance met with UK Foreign Secretary David Lammy on Friday at a stately home south of London, with the two leaders saying the agenda includes global economics and the Israel-Hamas war and Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

title: "More Corrupt Than Lalu": Prashant Kishor's Jibe On BJP Leaders In Bihar
content: Jan Suraaj Party founder Prashant Kishor on Friday flagged "serious irregularities" in the health department of Bihar, and alleged that leaders of the saffron party in the state are "more corrupt" than RJD president Lalu Prasad.

title: Can March To Delhi 10 Times: Sonam Wangchuk On Ladakh's Statehood Demand
content: Reiterating the demand for statehood for Ladakh, climate activist Sonam Wangchuk said that they are prepared to take their movement ahead, and can even march to Delhi again if required.

title: 21 Killed After Bus Carrying People From Funeral Overturns In Kenya
content: A bus carrying mourners back home from a funeral in southwestern Kenya overturned and plunged into a ditch on Friday evening, killing at least 21 people, police said.

title: Meitei Alliance, Thadou Tribe Body Call For More Meetings For Peace In Manipur
content: The top umbrella body of Meitei civil society organisations from across the globe has called for frequent meetings of all communities in Manipur to bring understanding, peace and rule of law.

title: Top Court Stays Madhya Pradesh Order In Saif Ali Khan Family Property Dispute
content: The Supreme Court on Friday granted an interim stay on a Madhya Pradesh High Court order remanding a decades-old property dispute involving the royal estate of Bhopal's last Nawab, Hamidullah Khan, to the trial court for fresh adjudication.

title: 60-Year-Old Odisha Man Impregnated Minor Sister-In-law, Arrested
content: The police on Friday arrested a 60-year-old man on the charge of impregnating a minor girl, who is his sister-in-law, in Odisha's Balasore district, an officer said.

title: Probe Agency Opposes Sanjay Bhandari's Plea Against 'Fugitive Offender' Tag In Delhi High Court
content: The Enforcement Directorate on Friday opposed in the Delhi High Court a plea of UK-based arms consultant Sanjay Bhandari against a trial court's order declaring him a "fugitive economic offender".

title: "Our Country Deserves Greatness": Trump Defends Steep Tariffs Move
content: US President Donald Trump on Friday warned of a '1929-style Great Depression' if the court rules against tariffs. The US Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit, is set to pass judgment on Trump's tariffs.

title: Poll Body Says Websites Up And Running, Electoral Rolls Can Be Downloaded
content: The EC rejected claims that its websites in various states were down and the electoral rolls available on it were missing and asked Congress leader Rahul Gandhi to give a written declaration about his claims on wrongful ent

title: Delhi University Issues Guidelines To Curb Defacement Ahead Of Student Union Polls
content: The University of Delhi on Friday issued guidelines for the upcoming DUSU polls, mandating a bond of Rs 1 lakh from candidates and banning the use of posters, wall writing, rallies, loudspeakers, and roadshows on the varsity campus.

title: Thane Restaurant Owner Allegedly Threatens Marathis, Apologises After MNS Workers Show Up
content: A restaurant owner in Thane was threatened by Maharashtra Navnirman Sena (MNS) workers over allegations that he used abusive language against the Marathi language.

title: Any Tariff On Pharma Will Hit India, As 40% Exports Go To US: Report
content: Imposing tariffs on the pharmaceutical Industry will significantly impact the earnings of Indian pharma companies, as nearly 40 per cent of India's total pharma exports are directed to the US market, according to a report by SBI Research.

title: 2K details NBA 2K26 presentation and MyPlayer improvements
content: 2K and Visual Concepts are looking for graphical improvements with every new game . a new shader allows NBA 2K26 to portray sweat on athletes' bodies . the stitching on uniforms will be visible, giving names and numbers on the jerseys more presence .

content: our 32 team reporters have been on the ground every day following the action . we have updated 32 files with all the latest details . ARI | ATL | BAL | BUF | CAR | CHI | CIN CLE | cin cle | chris christian .

title: Seattle scrambles at first with Josh Naylor ailing
content: all 15 of today's games will be contested under the lights, starting at 6:40 p.m. ET with the Pittsburgh Pirates hosting the Cincinnati Reds . early forecasts around the league indicate that there are no weather concerns this evening .

title: Explaining MLS' discovery rights: What were Müller's extra steps to Vancouver?
content: MLS commissioner don Garber speaks about the potential change to the league's schedule after the 2026 FIFA World Cup . atypical but significant mechanism in MLS's single-entity structure called the Discovery List . the regulation allows teams to "discover" and select up to five non-MLS players .

title: Community Shield will tell us whether Liverpool are the team to beat
content: arne slot has assembled "a really strong" squad going into the new season . the champions' 2025-26 campaign begins in earnest at home to Bournemouth on august 15 . it is a tradition that dates back more than a century .

title: Power Rankings entering Week 11
content: all eight teams are mathematically alive for the postseason . three teams have locked up playoff bids, while Utah and Maryland are living on the edge . both teams have established themselves as the class of the league . current record: 7-3 Previous ranking: 1 Denver split home games this past weekend .

title: 2026 recruiting class rankings: Breaking down the new top 40
content: ACC, Big Ten and SEC each hold at least 10 of those spots . the big Ten has the most teams ranked with 12 . but many of those players are inside the top 100 . OT Keenyi Pepe is a top defensive prospect .

title: NFL preseason Week 1 takeaways: Seahawks' Milroe flashes potential; Ravens' Wester dazzles in debut
content: the 2025 preseason kicks off with several rookies playing their first snaps . a play from Jalen Milroe 's debut showed exactly how he can help the Seahawks' offense this season even as their third QB .

title: PPR rankings: Top 100 for 2025
content: field Yates' 2025 fantasy football rankings will be updated throughout the preseason to reflect any changes in his view on players for the upcoming season . the rankings below are for PPR formats . he explains how Stefon Diggs could bounce back and put up big numbers in fantasy .

title: It has never been tougher to build an NBA dynasty: 'You literally can't mess anything up'
content: Iman Shumpert is looking forward to seeing how the Thunder respond after winning the title . since the Warriors won back-to-back titles in 2017 and 2018, the NBA has seen seven different champions hoist the Larry O'Brien Trophy . there have been 11 different finalists in each of the past six postseasons .

title: Why new RBs coach Tashard Choice fits in Detroit
content: quarterback Tashard Choice is on the practice field in his first season on the Lions' coaching staff . "it means a lot. We've been close since I was 16 or 17 now," Gibbs says . he says he's a 'familiar face' and 'we just ended up together' "it's really great having a familiar face," he adds .

title: 🏈 Ranking all 136 FBS teams in tiers
content: committees get it wrong nearly every year despite the fact that they've mostly gotten it right . reporters and coaches don't have the time to watch the games . if humans can't rank college football teams, it's just a matter of time be a species .

title: Zion to A'ja: Ranking the Carolinas' top high school hoopers since 2000
content: the "SportsCenter" quest focuses on the Carolinas: North and South . from zion Williamson to a'ja Wilson, these hoopers represent some of the finest to ever play high school basketball in the region . he finished ranked no. 2 overall in the ESPN 100 in 2018 .

title: No declaration on oath? Then apologise: EC official to Rahul
content: Bharti Jain is senior editor with The Times of India, New Delhi. She has been writing on security matters since 1996. Having covered the Union home ministry, security agencies, Election Commission and the ‘prime’ political beat, the Congress, for The Economic Times all these years, she moved to TOI in August 2012. Her repertoire of news stories delves into the whole gamut of issues related to terrorism and internal strife, besides probing strategic affairs in India’s neighbourhood. title: Power Rankings: Who's the best team in baseball right now?
content: the Phillies sit at no. 1 for the third consecutive week . the Yankees have dropped five straight games since July 31 . they have fallen to their lowest ranking of the season at No. 12 . but the red sox have won seven of their last eight games .

title: Parents of R.G. Kar victim to lead march to West Bengal  Secretariat to mark one year of the crime
content: Family sends invitations to political parties except Trinamool; police issue prohibitory orders, mark Howrah’s Santragachi Bus Stand and Kolkata’s Rani Rashmoni Avenue as alternative venues for rally

title: Chief Minister Stalin presents awards to Tamil scholars at Kamban Vizha 2025
content: He says the Dravidian movement viewed the Kamba Ramayana from a different perspective, praising the work for its poetry and the richness of its Tamil

title: Stir against SIR a meeting point for Trinamool and Congress
content: The Trinamool Congress has often said that it is the only party in the INDIA bloc to not have an electoral alliance with the Congress. However, at a dinner meet hosted by Rahul Gandhi, the two sides seemed to have turned a page

title: Rajnath postpones U.S. visit; defence purchases unaffected
content: Minister was to go to U.S. this month-end to boost defence ties with the signing of a 10-year plan; officials reject reports that India has stopped defence purchases from U.S. in response to tariff row

title: Government approves MERITE scheme to strengthen technical institutes
content: The scheme, with an outlay of ₹4,200 crore for five years, aims to develop guidelines for multidisciplinary programmes in technical courses, and increase learning and employability skills

title: Indrakeeladri to host mass Varalakshmi Vratham on August 22
content: The presiding deity atop Indrakeeladri Goddess Kanaka Durga adorned and worshipped as Sri Varalakshmi Devi on the occasion of “Sravana Masam Vara Lakshmi Devi pooja”

title: Left parties to observe protest day on August 28 against power tariff hikes, smart meters
content: Date marks 25 years since 2000 electricity reforms stir; parties also slam government for aiding private steel projects over Visakha Steel Plant.

title: Russia is not Iran, India can’t cancel oil imports on U.S. demand: experts
content: Former Ambassador to Washington says Trump tariffs, penalty reviving ‘bitter memories’ of previous U.S. coercive actions

title: Madras High Court restrains functioning of office-bearers appointed by DMK to MTC trade union without conducting elections
content: Justice K. Kumaresh Babu grants the interim injunction pursuant to a civil suit filed by 59 members of Metropolitan Transport Corporation Oozhiyar Progressive Union

title: Andhra Pradesh records 52% kharif sowing amid rainfall deficit
content: Principal crop paddy sees sowing in 8.11 lakh hectares reaching 55% of seasonal target, maize, ragi, bajra performing well with sowing percentages of 88, 89, and 72 respectively; Chittoor district leads State with 167% of its seasonal normal area sown

title: Police rescue baby hours after father sells her away for ₹5,000 to a couple
content: The accused who bought the three-year-old planned to maim her and use her for seeking alms, say railway police

title: KHB plans a mega sports centre in Surya City to house a cricket stadium of 80,000 seating capacity
content: This will likely be the second largest cricket stadium in the country after the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad, which has a seating capacity of 1,32,000

title: Uttarkashi flash floods: Rescue efforts at Dharali continue, heavy rain forecast
content: Administration deploys thermal imaging cameras and sniffer dogs to look for survivors; residents from nearby village say toll could be higher as 50 labourers were working at a site when the flash flood struck

title: Rights panel asks home dept. to decide on estimate for maintenance of water tank in Ernakulam district jail
content: SHRC Chairman directs the Additional Chief Secretary (Home department) to decide on the matter within a month of receiving the estimate from the head of the Prison dept.

title: Kerala HC denies life convict’s plea for emergency parole
content: Most fundamental rights of convicts remain suspended after conviction and cannot be diluted by granting emergency leave regularly, except in truly extraordinary situations, the court observes

title: Task force for well-being of students unveils portal
content: Initiative seeks views from students, parents, faculty, experts and public to inform report to apex court

title: Akshaya entrepreneurs in Ernakulam suspend K-Smart services over low service charges
content: Service fees were revised only once in 23 years, say entrepreneurs, who argue that ₹50 for a 30-minute ownership change or ₹70 for a 45-minute marriage registration is unsustainable

title: Sharp drop in child labour cases in Andhra Pradesh, say officials
content: Stricter enforcement of laws, rehabilitation of rescued children, and better coordination among departments drive the decline, while officials urge continued vigilance to end the practice completely

title: High Court issues notices to CCLA
content: Petitioners challenged the order passed by the Chief Commission of Land Administration declaring two parcels of land in Sulthanpally village as government lands

title: Bombay High Court orders reinstatement of 53 contract workers terminated in 1995
content: Calling the denial of reinstatement a “grave travesty of justice,” the Bombay High Court has directed the Thane Municipal Corporation to reinstate 53 contract workers terminated in 1995.

title: Punjab’s land pooling policy faces question over intent, transparency from stakeholders
content: Farmer unions, political parties, and academics question transparency and intent; High Court grants interim stay

title: Hyderabad flood solution | Divert rain water to nalas and tanks, connect them to Musi: Telangana CM
content: Revanth Reddy directs officials to take steps to see that flood water is discharged into Musi and expedite works on rejuvenation of tanks and widening of nalas

title: Kerala should show the way in fight to protect equality, secularism, says Brinda Karat at P. Govinda Pillai centenary
content: Amid Sangh Parivar’s increasing attacks on secularism and attempts at rewriting history, it is important to take forward the legacy of PG, says Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan.

title: ASHAs to take out march for implementation of Centre’s incentive hike
content: Association says State government has said many times that it will hike the honorarium when the Centre does so

title: Rahul Gandhi is risking his credibility, alleges BJP
content: Responding to Mr. Gandhi’s allegations, Union Minister and BJP leader Bhupender Yadav said that in the Maharashtra 2024 Assembly election, the Congress and allies had, in fact, won most of the seats where the votes had increased.

title: HC permits Sidharthan’s family to withdraw compensation amount of ₹7 lakh
content: The 20-year-old student was found dead at the College of Veterinary and Animal Sciences in Wayanad in February 2024, allegedly following ragging

title: Mahadevapura has seen allegations over electoral roll manipulation earlier too
content: Activists are seeking a through investigation into the allegations by EC without politicising the issue

title: Nannaya varsity staff, 4 students booked for defaming student
content: The victim lodged a police complaint after two in-house committees failed to address the issue since January

title: Day after Rahul Gandhi’s ‘expose’, access to voter rolls hits a snag
content: An error message saying “Warning: Success” appeared when The Hindu attempted to download rolls from Delhi and Goa; the rolls were available after the EC posted a ‘fact check’ on social media

title: SC seeks Centre’s response on plea alleging apathy towards persons with autistic spectrum disorders
content: Staff at airports, railway stations and metro services need to be sensitised to the issue, says petitioner

title: Assam CM accuses Mamata of creating NRC fear for political gain
content: Himanta Biswa Sarma said his West Bengal counterpart has been raking up the issue with the 2026 Assembly elections in mind

title: Koratagere murder mystery deepens as police discover severed head of woman
content: A senior police officer overseeing the investigations told The Hindu they suspected that the body parts were of a woman, and it was confirmed after discovering the severed head

title: Andhra Pradesh cocoa farmers demand State Board, protest price fall
content: Association plans to form a Farmer Producer Organisation, urges a ban on cocoa bean imports, and prepares to launch protests to safeguard domestic prices

title: Gaps found in treatment of sewage generated in Ernakulam
content: Only 28.46 MLD of the total sewage of 157 MLD generated in the Kochi Corporation and various municipalities in Ernakulam is processed through STPs, say official estimates

title: Prashant Kishor accuses Bihar BJP leaders of corruption, cites ‘financial irregularities’
content: Jan Suraaj Party founder alleges graft against State Health Minister and BJP chief; party terms charges ‘frivolous’

title: Artist keeping tribal Oraon art alive
content: Chhattisgarh’s Anamika Bhagat brings the rich tradition of Oraon tribal art, passed down through generations, using natural material and colours, to Thiruvananthapuram.

title: Varalakshmi Vratham celebration held on grand scale at Tiruchanur temple
content: The temple premises was adorned with exotic flowers, while the deity was worshipped with traditional flowers like rose, jasmine, chrysanthemum, maruvam, Tulasi, lotus etc. A unique decoration with nine sacred threads, symbolising the nine divine forms, was offered to the Goddess.

title: Forum files complaint accusing forest department of discriminating against tribal BFOs
content: The Kerala Ullada Mahasabha says department officials mark ‘special recruitment’ next to the names of the tribal beat officers

title: Andhra Pradesh SGFI invites nominations for U-15 volleyball trials in Pune
content: District and State-level selections in August to shortlist eight boys and eight girls for national trials ahead of World School Volleyball Championship in China

content: e-Paper The View From India Looking at World Affairs from the Indian perspective . the weekly newsletter from science writers takes the jargon out of science and puts the fun in . CHENNAI Chennai-based Impacteers has launched a AI powered Business-to-Talent platform .
